entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy or rain beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or rain. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except rainfall amount 15 mm near Lake Erie. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
